verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%> Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who fears <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3050><s%> who delights <S%H2654><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> in his commandments. <S%H4687><s%>
His seed <S%H2233><s%> will be mighty <S%H1368><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%> The generation <S%H1755><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> will be blessed. <S%H1288><s%>
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> and riches <S%H6239><s%> are in his house. <S%H1004><s%> His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endures <S%H5975><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>
Light <S%H216><s%> dawns <S%H2224><s%> in the darkness <S%H2822><s%> for the upright, <S%H3477><s%> gracious, <S%H2587><s%> merciful, <S%H7349><s%> and righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
It is well <S%H2896><s%> with the man <S%H376><s%> who deals graciously <S%H2603><s%> and lends. <S%H3867><s%> He will maintain <S%H3557><s%> his cause <S%H1697><s%> in judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
For he will never <S%H5769><s%> be shaken. <S%H4131><s%> The righteous <S%H6662><s%> will be remembered <S%H2143><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
He will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> news. <S%H8052><s%> His heart <S%H3820><s%> is steadfast, <S%H3559><s%> trusting <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
His heart <S%H3820><s%> is established. <S%H5564><s%> He will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> in the end when he sees <S%H7200><s%> his adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>

He has dispersed, <S%H6340><s%> he has given <S%H5414><s%> to the poor. <S%H34><s%> His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endures <S%H5975><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%> His horn <S%H7161><s%> will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> with honor. <S%H3519><s%>

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H3707><s%> and be grieved. He shall gnash <S%H2786><s%> with his teeth, <S%H8127><s%> and melt away. <S%H4549><s%> The desire <S%H8378><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will perish. <S%H6><s%>
